haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Ltn Patrik Schorner
Ltn Fritz Bernert
Fw Gunther Huwyler
Fw Ralf Schulz

 The mission was flown from Bonneuil Ferme aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 12/05/1916 near Camp.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc N.12 was brought down by Lukas Heffter of Jasta 4.
S/Lt Maurice Chapelant was killed in action.
Lukas Heffter was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 12/05/1916 near Tergnier.
A F.E.2b of Esc 40 was brought down by Patrik Schorner of Jasta 4.
Edmond Daucourt was lightly wounded.
Paul Laborie was not injured.
Patrik Schorner was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 12/05/1916 near Tergnier.
A F.E.2b of Esc 40 was brought down by Fritz Bernert of Jasta 4.
Jacob Laferriere was killed in action.
Ernest Baux was made a prisoner of war.
Fritz Bernert was  flying a Fokker E.III.
narrative: An excellent mission.  We find two French pushers and dispatch them without loss.
